string.text:
The Yugoslavian variant of the TT-33 from 1957 until 1992 offers a lot of improvements from the TT-33, including a longer frame, improving handling, and a longer magazine, allowing one more round to be loaded. Of important note, due to how it was engineered, it's easily possible to switch the caliber to 9x19.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255]Origin: %c[ui_gray_1]Yugoslavia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255]Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_1]Zastava Arms
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255]Production Year: %c[ui_gray_1]1992
